entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy glanced around. Harry knew he was checking for signs of teachers. Then he looked back at Harry and said in a low voice, “You’re dead, Potter.”

entities.description: Harry raised his eyebrows. “Funny,” he said, “you’d think I’d have stopped walking around. . . .”
